library_url = 'http://216.10.245.166/Library'

    def test_get_book_without_auth_returns_401(http_session, library_url):
        """
        Cas négatif :
        Appel API protégée sans authentification
        → attendu : 401 Unauthorized
        """
    
        url = _build_url(library_url, ApiResources.GET_BOOK)
    
        # ⚠️ On retire volontairement toute auth / token
        http_session.headers.pop("Authorization", None)
    
        response = http_session.get(
            url,
            params={"AuthorName": "Rahul Shetty2"}
        )
    
        # Debug utile si le test échoue
        if response.status_code != 401:
            print("URL     =", url)
            print("STATUS  =", response.status_code)
            print("BODY    =", response.text)
            print("HEADERS =", response.headers)
